start: Everyone close your eyes and extend your hand into a fist in front of you.
Spies open your eyes and look around to see your fellow spies.
commander: All players should have their eyes closed and hands in a fist in front of them.
Spies - extend your thumb so the Commandor will know you.
Commander, open your eyes and see the Spies.
Spies - put your thumbs down and re-form your hand into a fist.
end: All players should have their eyes closed and hands in a fist in front of them.
